mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMIS_MEM(member_name, user_id, member_pw, member_sex, member_age, member_phone, member_address, member_sns, member_lv, regdate, member_email) VALUES (#{member_name}, #{user_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_sex}, #{member_age}, #{member_phone}, #{member_address}, #{member_sns}, #{member_lv}, DATE_ADD(current_timestamp(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), #{member_email})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM CMIS_MEM WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT * from CMIS_MEM WHERE member_name=#{member_name} and member_email=#{member_email}
select * FROM CMIS_MEM where user_id= #{user_id} and member_email=#{member_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE CMIS_MEM set user_id=#{user_id}, member_name=#{member_name}, member_pw=#{member_pw}, member_address=#{member_address}, member_age=#{member_age}, member_phone=#{member_phone} where user_id= #{user_id}
